hero.title: Choose Your Plan

free.title: Free
free.description: Basic predictions and features for casual bettors.

pro.title: Pro
pro.description: Advanced predictions and analytics for serious bettors.

elite.title: Elite
elite.description: Premium features and exclusive content for professional bettors.

annualDiscount.title: Save with Annual Billing
annualDiscount.description: Get 2 months free when you choose annual billing.

questions.q1: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
questions.a1: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period.
questions.q2: Is there a free trial for paid plans?
questions.a2: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial for both Pro and Elite plans. No credit card required to start your trial.
questions.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a3: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.
questions.a4: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll be charged the prorated difference. When downgrading, the change will take effect at the end of your current billing period.
questions.a5: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with your subscription.

cta.title: Ready to Elevate Your Betting Strategy?
cta.description: Join thousands of bettors who are making smarter decisions with AI Sports Edge.
